sense.def:
To write something
ali
to write something down
pomeni uporabiti pero ali svinčnik, da na neko površino napišemo besede, črke ali številke.

seg.quote: I'm learning to read and write.
Write the appropriate letter on the label.
I wrote down what the boy said.

sense.def:
To write something
pomeni nekaj ustvariti in zaznamovati na papirju, na primer knjigo, pesem ali skladbo.

seg.quote: I have been asked to write a biography of Dylan Thomas.

sense.def:
To write
pomeni ustvarjati knjige, zgodbe ali članke, navadno za objavo.

To write to someone
ali
to write someone a letter
pomeni v pismu nekomu dati podatke, ga nekaj vprašati ali izraziti svoja čustva.

seg.quote: I've written to invite him here.
She wrote me a letter from Singapore.
She wrote a note to the chief of police.

sense.def:
To write something
ali
to write something out
pomeni na nekaj, na primer ček ali potrdilo, zapisati zahtevane podatke in jih podpisati.

seg.quote: I remember writing a cheque for £100.
I went to write out the death certificate.

sense.def:
To write in to an organization
pomeni poslati pismo neki organizaciji.

seg.quote: People have been phoning and writing in asking for advice.

sense.def:
Kadar je neko pravilo ali podrobnost
written into a contract or agreement
, je vključena v pogodbo ali sporazum, ko je sestavljen.

seg.quote: The new arrangements have been written into the agreement.

sense.def:
To write off to a company or organization
pomeni poslati pismo nekemu podjetju ali organizaciji in v njem za nekaj prositi.

seg.quote: I was writing off to various places asking about work opportunities.

sense.def:
To write off an amount of money
pomeni sprijazniti se s tem, da ne bomo nikdar dobili nazaj zneska, ki smo ga izgubili.

seg.quote: I've written off that hundred pounds.

sense.def:
To write off a plan or project
pomeni sprijazniti se s tem, da ne bomo uspešni pri nekem načrtu ali projektu, in ga ne nadaljevati.

To write someone off
pomeni skleniti, da je nekdo nepomemben ali nekoristen.

seg.quote: You will be written off as a hysterical woman.

sense.def:
To write up something
pomeni nekaj, kar je bilo storjeno ali rečeno, spraviti na papir v urejeni in popolni obliki.

seg.quote: These are notes that you are going to write up afterwards.
The results were written up into a report.
